articles.author: Venkata Krishna B
articles.title: India blow away Sri Lanka by 10 wickets to clinch 8th Asia Cup title as Mohammed Siraj stars with 6 wickets - The Indian Express
articles.description: India's young openers Shubman Gill and Ishan Kishan completed the chase in 6.1 overs for a 10-wicket win and the Asia Cup title.
articles.content: AFTER INDIA shot Sri Lanka down for just 50 runs in the Asia Cup final, wrecker-in-chief Mohammed Siraj told the official broadcasters during the innings break that he felt everything was like a drea… [+4789 chars]
